projects.title: Expanding Cards
projects.description: This component contains some cards which show a content preview. Once clicked, the panel expands to its full size and a caption for the panel, whereas the other panels contract in other to better accomodate the full-sized one. It is best used with pictures. To enhance the original project, I coded a close panel animation with returns the expanded panel to its original size.
